content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite attractive. So, what price were you thinking of for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate the offer. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you tell me what you believe is a reasonable price for this unit?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, as a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. I'd like to start at €950 per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I understand your position. €950 is a significant amount. Can we negotiate a lower price that would be more in line with the market value for a newly built unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm willing to listen to your offer, but keep in mind that this apartment is in high demand due to its location and amenities. A lower price would have to be significantly lower for me to consider it. What is your counter-offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of your apartment. However, I must be honest with you. As a student, I'm on a tight budget. I was hoping to find something closer to €800 per month. Would you be willing to go that low?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand your situation, but €800 is far below my expectations for this apartment. I'm not willing to go that low. However, I could consider €900 if you're willing to sign a long-term lease. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, €900 is more acceptable, especially with a long-term lease. Would you be willing to include any additional benefits or consider a slightly lower price if I were to sign a two-year lease?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm not interested in providing additional benefits or lowering the price further. However, if you're willing to sign a two-year lease at €900 per month, I would be willing to waive the security deposit. How does that sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, waiving the security deposit is a very generous offer. I would be happy to sign a two-year lease at €900 per month with the understanding that there will be no security deposit required. I agree to the price of €900!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €900! Let's proceed with the lease agreement. Max, you've made a wise choice. This apartment won't be on the market for long at such a competitive price. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
